title: Strengthening Nursing Practice Competencies: Human-Computer Interaction via Project-Based Cloud Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Basic computer literacy and experience in using digital tools
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can collaboratively execute HCI design projects using Google services (Drive, Docs, Jamboard, etc.) in a PBCL environment.
Learners can critically analyze and improve the HCI design process—from user experience (UX) research to prototype implementation.
Learners can demonstrate creative problem-solving skills and digital literacy through project deliverables.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
